definition: square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter

sentences.english: Practise shows that research of ancient prescriptions is an effective way to develop new drugs.
sentences.chinese: 实践证明，古方研究是新药开发的有效途径之一。

sentences.english: Varieties from the companys Millennium Cuba.
sentences.chinese: 本公司的品种选自千年古方。

sentences.english: Objective To study the effects of Huangqisan on blood glucose level in mice.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究古方黄芪散对血糖的影响。

definition: a tried and tested medical prescription
Prescriptions Worth a Thousand in Gold, early Tang compendium of herbal medicine by Sun Simiao 孫思邈|孙思邈[Sun1 Si1 miao3]
lit. food and medicine come from the same source (idiom)/fig. there is no clear-cut distinction between food and medicine
a book on Chinese (herbal) medicine/Chinese materia medica
prescription of elixir/potion of immortality/potion prescribed by an immortal
prescription/cooking recipe/formulation/completing the square (to solve quadratic equation, math.)
